speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Jason calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, but why are you calling me?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding your overdue balance on your account. I just wanted to discuss your payment options.

speaker: Customer
text: I already requested to be on your do not call list last month.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check that for you and ensure your number is marked correctly.

speaker: Customer
text: Please do it quickly. I don’t want to hear from you again.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely. I’ll mark your number as do not call right now.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, I hope this is the last call.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! I've completed the request. You won't receive any further calls.
